ps1.6:1.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:1.2.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasampayutte katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:1.3.pli: Rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:1.4.pli: Arūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:2.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:2.2.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:2.3.pli: Rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:2.4.pli: Arūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:3.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:4.1.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.2.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.3.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.4.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.5.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.6.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.7.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.8.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.9.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.10.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.11.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime aṭṭhavīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:4.12.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:5.1.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:6.1.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.2.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.3.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.4.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.5.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.6.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.7.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.8.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.9.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.10.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.11.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime aṭṭhavīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:6.12.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇasampayutte imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:7.1.pli: Rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:7.3.pli: rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:8.1.pli: Arūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:9.1.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:9.2.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcindriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:9.3.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:9.4.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:9.5.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:9.6.pli: Arūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:10.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:10.2.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇavippayutte katinaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:11.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:11.2.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:12.1.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:13.1.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.2.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.3.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.4.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.5.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.6.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.7.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāri indriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.8.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.9.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca viññāṇañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.10.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime dvādasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.11.pli: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime chabbīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.

ps1.6:13.12.pli: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte imesaṃ channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.

ps1.6:14.1.pli: Khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?

ps1.6:14.6.pli: khattiyamahāsālānaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ gahapatimahāsālānaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ ñāṇavippayutte imesaṃ channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti.

ps1.7:4.1.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:4.2.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:4.3.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:4.4.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:4.5.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:4.6.pli: Ahosi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:5.1.pli: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:5.2.pli: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:5.3.pli: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:5.4.pli: Atthi kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:6.1.pli: Bhavissati kusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:6.2.pli: Bhavissati kusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.1.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.2.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.3.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.4.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.5.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:7.6.pli: Ahosi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:8.1.pli: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:8.2.pli: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:8.3.pli: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:8.4.pli: Atthi akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:9.1.pli: Bhavissati akusalaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:9.2.pli: Bhavissati akusalaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.8.pli: ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, ahosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.9.pli: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, nāhosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.10.pli: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.11.pli: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.12.pli: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:10.13.pli: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:11.1.pli: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:11.2.pli: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:11.3.pli: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:11.4.pli: Atthi dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:12.1.pli: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.

ps1.7:12.2.pli: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṃ kammaṃ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipākoti.

ps1.8:1.4.pli: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:1.5.pli: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:1.6.pli: Anattani, bhikkhave, attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:1.7.pli: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:1.8.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro saññāvipallāsā cittavipallāsā diṭṭhivipallāsā.

ps1.8:2.3.pli: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:2.4.pli: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:2.5.pli: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattāti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:2.6.pli: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasaññāvipallāso nacittavipallāso nadiṭṭhivipallāso.

ps1.8:2.7.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro nasaññāvipallāsā nacittavipallāsā nadiṭṭhivipallāsā”ti.

ps1.8:8.1.pli: Ime cattāro vipallāsā diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā, appahīnāti.

ps1.8:8.3.pli: Anicce niccanti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.

ps1.8:8.4.pli: Dukkhe sukhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.

ps1.8:8.5.pli: Anattani attāti saññāvipallāso cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.

ps1.8:8.6.pli: Asubhe subhanti saññā uppajjati, cittaṃ uppajjati, diṭṭhivipallāso pahīno.

ps1.8:8.8.pli: Dvīsu vatthūsu dve vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā.

ps1.8:8.9.pli: Catūsu vatthūsu aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, cattāro vipallāsā appahīnāti.

ps1.9:1.2.pli: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:2.1.pli: Abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:3.1.pli: Pariggahaṭṭhena sammāvācā micchāvācāya pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:4.1.pli: Samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammākammanto micchākammantassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:5.1.pli: Vodānaṭṭhena sammāājīvo micchāājīvassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…

ps1.9:5.2.pli: paggahaṭṭhena sammāvāyāmo micchāvāyāmassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…

ps1.9:5.3.pli: upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena sammāsati micchāsatiyā pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca …pe…

ps1.9:5.4.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi micchāsamādhissa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:6.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikassa kāmarāgasaññojanassa paṭighasaññojanassa oḷārikassa kāmarāgānusayassa paṭighānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:7.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatassa kāmarāgasaññojanassa paṭighasaññojanassa, anusahagatassa kāmarāgānusayassa paṭighānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:8.2.pli: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgassa arūparāgassa mānassa uddhaccassa avijjāya, mānānusayassa bhavarāgānusayassa avijjānusayassa pahānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ upatthambhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, kilesānaṃ pariyādānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, paṭivedhādivisodhanāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa adhiṭṭhānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, cittassa, vodānāya maggo ceva hetu ca, visesādhigamāya maggo ceva hetu ca, uttaripaṭivedhāya maggo ceva hetu ca, saccābhisamayāya maggo ceva, hetu ca, nirodhe patiṭṭhāpanāya maggo ceva hetu ca.

ps1.9:9.1.pli: Dassanamaggo sammādiṭṭhi, abhiniropanamaggo sammāsaṅkappo, pariggahamaggo sammāvācā, samuṭṭhānamaggo sammākammanto, vodānamaggo sammāājīvo, paggahamaggo sammāvāyāmo, upaṭṭhānamaggo sammāsati, avikkhepamaggo sammāsamādhi.

ps1.9:9.2.pli: Upaṭṭhānamaggo satisambojjhaṅgo, pavicayamaggo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, paggahamaggo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pharaṇamaggo pītisambojjhaṅgo, upasamamaggo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, avikkhepamaggo samādhisambojjhaṅgo, paṭisaṅkhānamaggo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.

ps1.9:10.1.pli: Assaddhiye akampiyamaggo saddhābalaṃ, kosajje akampiyamaggo vīriyabalaṃ, pamāde akampiyamaggo satibalaṃ, uddhacce akampiyamaggo samādhibalaṃ, avijjāya akampiyamaggo paññābalaṃ.

ps1.9:10.2.pli: Adhimokkhamaggo saddhindriyaṃ, paggahamaggo vīriyindriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānamaggo satindriyaṃ, avikkhepamaggo samādhindriyaṃ, dassanamaggo paññindriyaṃ.

ps1.9:11.1.pli: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maggo, akampiyaṭṭhena balā maggo, niyyānaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā maggo, hetuṭṭhena maggaṅgā maggo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānā maggo, padahanaṭṭhena sammappadhānā maggo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādā maggo, tathaṭṭhena saccāni maggo, avikkhepaṭṭhena samatho maggo, anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā maggo, ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanā maggo, anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhā maggo, saṃvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi maggo, avikkhepaṭṭhena cittavisuddhi maggo, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi maggo, muttaṭṭhena vimokkho maggo, paṭivedhaṭṭhena vijjā maggo, pariccāgaṭṭhena vimutti maggo, samucchedaṭṭhena khaye ñāṇaṃ maggo, chando mūlaṭṭhena maggo, manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena maggo, phasso samodhānaṭṭhena maggo, vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena maggo, samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena maggo, sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena maggo, paññā taduttaraṭṭhena maggo, vimutti sāraṭṭhena maggo, amatogadhaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyosānaṭṭhena maggoti.
